title: Cardiac remote ischaemic preconditioning reduces periprocedural myocardial infarction for patients undergoing percutaneous coronary interventions: a meta-analysis of randomised clinical trials
authors: Fabrizio D’Ascenzo, Claudio Moretti, Pierluigi Omedè, Enrico Cerrato, Erika Cavallero, Fikret Er, Davide Giacomo Presutti, Francesco Colombo, Gabriele Crimi, Federico Conrotto, James J. DiNicolantonio, Shaoliang Chen, Abhiram Prasad, Giuseppe Biondi Zoccai, Fiorenzo Gaita
